title: koniyADEDu
sahitya:
koniyADEDu nAyeDa daya velaku goniyADEDavu sumi rAma ninu



anupallavi



 anayamu nI sogasunu gani pongaDucu antarangamuna nati prEmatO ninu



caraNam



 vinta vinta matamulalO jOrabaDi veta jendaga lEdanu nI manasuna kinta

     delisi tyAgarAjanuta EvElanu nI shubha caritamunu
